description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	IT strategy planning
              
              •	IT budget control
              
              •	System develop: Streamlining, job improvement, productivity improvement by utilize IT
              
              •	IT asset control
              
              •	Information control
              
              •	Management and dealing with problems: Telephone, printers, fax machines, camera, timer system…
              
              •	Cyber security
              
              (details: to be discussed during interview)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Male, under 30 years old
              
              •	University degree (full-time) in Information Techonology
              
              •	Having 2-3 years of experience in IT field
              
              •	Excellent in Microsoft Office
              
              •	Good communication skills of English
              
              Benefits:
              
              •	The successful candidates will be worked in professional, dynamic, friendly environment.
              
              •	To be arranged pick up by the Company from fixed station to working place.
              
              •	To be contributed Social Insurance, Health Insurance and Unemployment Insurance under Vietnamese Labor Law; specifially to be contributed Workman Insurance by MSIG.
              
              •	Working days: Monday to Friday, Saturday off in rotation as company calendar.
              
              •	Allowance: Attendance allowance, Traveling allowance, Language allowance, huosing allowance… yearly bonus
              
              •	Join other annual activities of company: Yamaha family day, summer holiday trip, Lunar new year party with lucky draw, Male football, Female football…
              
              •	Basic Salary: from 10 Million VND
              

              All Application letter and CV in English, University Degree certificate (copy), with recent photo until 24th July 2018 to:
              
              Phòng Hành chính Nhân sự
              
              Công ty TNHH Sản xuất phụ tùng Yamaha Motor Việt Nam
              
              Lô G1-G2 KCN Thăng Long, Võng La, Đông Anh, Hà Nội
              
              Note:     - Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
